title: Docker Network Management
description: Manage Docker networks for container connectivity.

cards.prompt: Using Docker networking, list all Docker networks.
Using Docker networking, inspect details of network app_net.
cards.explanation: Inspect shows subnet, gateway, and attached containers.

cards.prompt: Using Docker networking, create a bridge network named app_net.
cards.explanation: Bridge is the common user-defined local network driver.

cards.prompt: Using Docker networking, connect running container api to network app_net.
cards.explanation: Connects container to an additional network.

cards.prompt: Using Docker networking, disconnect container api from network app_net.
cards.explanation: Removes container from a specific network.

cards.prompt: Using Docker networking, remove network app_net.
cards.explanation: Network must have no attached containers.

cards.prompt: Using Docker networking, remove all unused Docker networks without prompt.
cards.explanation: Prunes only networks not used by containers.
